name: Air Traffic Communications
description: A website to help aviators to practice their radio communication skills. It provides voice recordings from real life air traffic communications. There is a questions section as well in which visitors can test their listening skills.

name: Blur Game
description: A game that blurs the images and makes you find the objects in the image. It's targeting kids as well as adults. There is a level system in which you can compare your overall score with other players.

name: Doctor's Office Landing Page
description: A landing page for doctor's office. Includes a contact form implemented via Formik library.

name: ShowNote CLI tool for TaskWarriorÂ©
description: This CLI tool add note-taking functionality to TaskWarrior(TW). TW is a cli todo app with lots of great features, but one thing it lack is an improved note-taking system. It annotation feature but its limited in functionality. And in practice it's limited to couple of words. ShowNote cli app fills that gap and add note-taking functionality to TW. It's desinged to use API so that friction is minimum.
